item.title: Call sequence
item.description: Call sequenceThe API call examples in this site illustrate the recommended sequence of calling the two APIs (the Cloudflare Filters API and the Firewall Rules API). The image below depicts this sequence, which can be applied for creating and editing rules. The reverse would apply for delete operations. Cloudflare recommends this sequence because it facilitates filter reusability and allows working with either API independently. Thanks to the standalone nature of Cloudflare Filters, the same filter can be shared in multiple firewall rules and in other future Cloudflare products and features.
